The value of an integrated platform will further solidify CA as a leader in the automotive space, and add to the \\\"stickyness\\\" of our combined product offerings. We are currently starting with DMS data, as there is a need for new reporint cababilites, and Product has deemed DMS data as the foundation of any integrated solution. After DMS data is brought into our RAR platform we will bring Vin data into the platform to build out the integration component, and them move to the next business unit.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Retail APIs\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The objectives of this release train are -\\n1. OVE, RMS Private Stores, Simulcast and the Manheim mobile app.\\nThe team's mission is to put the right cars in front of each buyer at the right time with the right information, making vehicle acquisition effortless and providing confidence to drive transactions.\\nThe team breaks down in to\\n* Find - Provide simple, intuitive experiences that utilize intelligence to present relevant, normalized inventory\\n* Decide - Streamline inventory evaluation and bring buying confidence through improved access to vehicle and condition information\\n* Buy - Deliver listings seamlessly across applicable marketplaces to maximize inventory Manheim Express, RMS Private Stores  and parts of OVE and the Manheim mobile app.\\nThe team's vision is to enable sellers to confidently optimize and easily execute their vehicle portfolio disposition strategy, maximizing net proceeds.\\nThe team breaks down in to\\n* Evaluate - Provide a simple means of capturing and informing sellers of vehicle and condition information to enable holistic evaluation of inventory to drive disposition decisions.\\n* Prepare - Enable sellers to easily prepare vehicles for sale across channels by providing guidance on pricing and channel given condition and past sale performance to increase probability of sale.\\n* Sell - Enable sellers to easily list, track, manage, and dispose of inventory across channels to achieve optimum portfolio
